item.title: Trump White House ballroom financed by Big Tech and these other corporate donors
item.description: Big Tech and other publicly traded companies are helping to finance the $300 million White House ballroom planned by President Donald Trump.

item.title: Oil jumps 5% after Trump administration sanctions big Russian oil companies
item.description: The new sanctions are related to plans for a meeting between President Donald Trump and Russian leader Vladimir Putin being dropped.

item.title: Trump pardons convicted Binance founder Changpeng Zhao
item.description: The pardon of the former Binance CEO came nearly a week after President Trump commuted the 87-month prison sentence of former New York Rep. George San...

item.title: Chauncey Billups, others arrested in FBI probe linking NBA to Mafia gambling ring
item.description: Terry Rozier, a 10-year NBA veteran, joined the Miami Heat in 2024 from the Charlotte Hornets.

item.title: White House East Wing demolition nearly complete to make room for Trump ballroom
item.description: Trump said Wednesday that the 90,000 square foot ballroom will cost $300 million, higher than the original estimated price tag of $200 million.
